info.title: Geo Circle API
info.description: A GeoCircle is a GeoShape representing a circular geographic area. As it is a GeoShape it provides the simple textual property 'circle', but also allows the combination of postalCode alongside geoRadius. The center of the circle can be indicated via the 'geoMidpoint' property, or more approximately using 'address', 'postalCode'.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Keyword search for item

parameters.name: additionaltype
parameters.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Physical address of the item.

parameters.name: addresscountry
parameters.description: The country. For example, USA. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

parameters.name: alternatename
parameters.description: An alias for the item.

parameters.name: box
parameters.description: A box is the area enclosed by the rectangle formed by two points. The first point is the lower corner, the second point is the upper corner. A box is expressed as two points separated by a space character.

parameters.name: circle
parameters.description: A circle is the circular region of a specified radius centered at a specified latitude and longitude. A circle is expressed as a pair followed by a radius in meters.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A short description of the item.

parameters.name: elevation
parameters.description: The elevation of a location (WGS 84).

parameters.name: geomidpoint
parameters.description: Indicates the GeoCoordinates at the centre of a GeoShape e.g. GeoCircle.

parameters.name: georadius
parameters.description: Indicates the approximate radius of a GeoCircle (metres unless indicated otherwise via Distance notation).

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.

parameters.name: line
parameters.description: A line is a point-to-point path consisting of two or more points. A line is expressed as a series of two or more point objects separated by space.

parameters.name: mainentityofpage
parameters.description: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described.            See background notes for details.       Inverse property: mainEntity.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the item.

parameters.name: polygon
parameters.description: A polygon is the area enclosed by a point-to-point path for which the starting and ending points are the same. A polygon is expressed as a series of four or more space delimited points where the first and final points are identical.

parameters.name: postalcode
parameters.description: The postal code. For example, 94043.

parameters.name: potentialaction
parameters.description: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.

parameters.name: sameas
parameters.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Freebase page, or official website.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the item.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique id for item

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique id for item
